sources.name: source1
sources.script:
source(output(
		bnk_id as string,
		bnk_name as string,
		address as string,
		city as string,
		state_code as string,
		contact_no as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> source1

sources.name: source2
sources.script:
source(output(
		state_name as string,
		state_code as string,
		country as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> source2

transformations.name: Lookup1
transformations.script:
source1, source2 lookup(source1@state_code == source2@state_code,
	broadcast: 'none')~> Lookup1
